main event: Two witnesses observed a UFO flying at approximately 8,900 ft over Columbia Falls, Montana, on 16 September 1967.
interesting points: The UFO emitted a flashing light and was accompanied by a white haze or smoke underneath it., The sighting lasted for around four minutes., The object was moving in an east to west direction towards Whitefish, Montana., The report was investigated by the 716 Radar Squadron., Insufficient data was noted for full evaluation of the sighting.
sighted object: UFO with a flashing light and smoke haze
witness description: two observers who reported the sighting
